channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Government Contractor KBR, Recently Hit by DOGE Fears, Draws Activist Investor
item.description: Irenic Capital Management has built a stake in KBR and plans to push the company to separate its segment that serves the private sector.

item.title: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq Move Higher After Fed-Fueled Selloff
item.description: Stocks were clawing back some ground after the Federal Reserve triggered a steep selloff by suggesting interest rates could stay higher next year than...

item.title: Costco quarter signals record stock run is not done yet. Here's our new price target
item.description: With gross margins and paid memberships trending higher, this rally to fresh highs can continue.

item.title: Micron shares plunge on weak second-quarter guidance
item.description: Micron shares plunged in extended trading after the chipmaker issued weaker-than-expected second-quarter guidance.

item.title: Sterling's Fall Against Euro Likely to Prove Brief
item.description: The euro was gaining against sterling after the Bank of England’s 6-3 vote to leave interest rates unchanged. Danske Bank expects this weakening of th...

item.title: Darden Restaurants stock climbs as Olive Garden, LongHorn Steakhouse fuel sales growth
item.description: Darden Restaurants met Wall Street's expectations for its fiscal second-quarter results.

item.title: AI chipmaker Broadcom shares soar 17% despite mixed quarterly results — here's why
item.description: We're increasing our price target on the stock after a slew of positive AI updates.

item.title: Nike will report earnings after the bell. Here's what Wall Street expects
item.description: Nike will report its first quarterly earnings since its new CEO, Elliott Hill, took the helm of the company in October.

item.title: Gold Extends Losses After U.S. GDP Data
item.description: Gold prices extended losses in evening trade in Europe, after the latest U.S. data showed the economy grew faster in the third quarter than previously...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Rise Ahead of Storage Data
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures were higher ahead of the EIA’s weekly storage report, with gains supported by a cold shot that’s likely to lift demand into t...
